content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Electricity generator at position(0,0)
Consists of steam engine (position 0,0), boiler (position 0,-1) and offshore pump (position 0,-2)

#### Copper plate mine at position(0,1)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 0,1) and a furnace at position(1,1)

#### Copper cable factory at position(1,2)
Consists of following entities
- Assembling machine at position(1,2) and inserter at position(1,3) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position 1,4) that connects the furnace at position 1,1 to assembling machine at position(1,2)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when trying to access non-existent entities
- Ensure that the entity you are trying to access (e.g., lab) exists at the specified position before attempting to get its details. Verify the position and the type of entity before executing the command.

### Errors when placing entities not available in inventory
- Always check your inventory for the required entities before attempting to place them. If an entity is not available, gather the necessary resources or craft the entity before placement.
